text: ed serum creatine phosphokinase - Hyporeflexia - Limb muscle weakness - Mood changes - Orofacial dyskinesia - Parkinsonism - Personality changes - Pes cavus - Progressive - Progressive choreoathetosis - Psychosis - Self-mutilation of tongue and lips due to involuntary movements - Sensory neuropathy - Tics - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected information on how often a sign or symptom occurs in a condition. Much of this information comes from Orphanet, a European rare disease databa
